languages.text: "Звезды не пропадают просто так — возможно, виновники тут те же, что и в системе Райкад Минорис... Лорд-капитан, Гордость Сантиэля — важный стратегический объект династии Чорда, что в одиночку обеспечивает прометием весь их протекторат. Понять, что случилось, не так уж сложно — проклятые ксеносы постарались! Но это не значит, что стоит вот так просто оставлять им на съедение важные стратегические ресурсы. Предлагаю сделать одолжение династии Чорда и спасти остатки ее прометия".

traits.locale_text: "Что за вздор, звезды не исчезают просто так! Но если мои глаза не лгут... Лорд-капитан, Гордость Сантиэля — важный стратегический объект династии Чорда, что в одиночку обеспечивает прометием весь их протекторат. Понять, что случилось, не так уж сложно — проклятые ксеносы постарались! Но это не значит, что стоит вот так просто оставлять им на съедение важные стратегические ресурсы. Предлагаю сделать одолжение Инсцендии Чорда и спасти остатки ее прометия".

languages.text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."
languages.original_text: "Звезды не пропадают просто так — возможно, виновники тут те же, что и в системе Райкад Минорис... Предлагаю сделать одолжение династии Чорда и спасти остатки ее прометия".

traits.locale_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

"What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the need for promethium of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them! But this does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

languages.text: « Les étoiles ne disparaissent pas sans raison, c'est sûrement l'œuvre des scélérats qui ont déjà sévi dans le système de Rykad. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la Gloire de Santiel est une planète d'une grande importance stratégique pour la dynastie Chorda. Elle permettrait à elle seule de subvenir aux besoins en prométhium du protectorat tout entier. On devine aisément ce qui s'est passé ici : ces maudits xénos ont repéré une proie facile et, par le Trône, ils ont réussi leur coup ! Toutefois, ça ne signifie pas qu'il faille les laisser piller des ressources essentielles sans sourciller. Je suggère de rendre service à la maison Chorda en récupérant le prométhium qui lui appartient de droit... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
languages.original_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

Je suggère de rendre service à la maison Chorda en récupérant le prométhium qui lui appartient de droit... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »

languages.text: “恒星根本不会从天上凭空消失——这件事情的幕后黑手，说不定和莱卡德星系的幕后黑手是同一批人……舰长大人，桑提尔之傲对库尔达王朝具有重要的战略意义，它可以供应整个王朝的钷素需求。当下发生的事情很容易理解，那些该死的异形谋划了极其复杂的阴谋，可黄金王座在上，他们竟然得手了！但即便如此，我们也不能把这些重要的战略资源任由他们掠夺。我建议我们帮库尔达家族一个忙，替他们回收剩下的钷素。”
languages.original_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

traits.locale_text: “恒星根本不会从天上凭空消失——这件事情的幕后黑手，说不定和莱卡德星系的幕后黑手是同一批人……舰长大人，桑提尔之傲对库尔达王朝具有重要的战略意义，它可以供应整个王朝的钷素需求。当下发生的事情很容易理解，那些该死的异形谋划了极其复杂的阴谋，可黄金王座在上，他们竟然得手了！但即便如此，我们也不能把这些重要的战略资源任由他们掠夺。我建议我们帮库尔达家族一个忙，替他们回收剩下的钷素。”

languages.text: "Sterne verschwinden doch nicht einfach grundlos! Hier sind vielleicht dieselben Schurken am Werk wie im Rykad-System ... Lord Captain, Santiels Stolz ist für die Chorda-Dynastie von strategischer Bedeutung. Diese Welt allein deckt den Promethium-Bedarf des gesamten Protektorats ab. Man muss kein Genie sein, um zu erraten, was geschehen ist. Das war kein leichtes Unterfangen für die verfluchten Xenos, aber beim Thron, sie haben es bewerkstelligt! Das heißt aber nicht, dass wir ihnen die wichtigen strategischen Güter einfach überlassen können. Ich schlage vor, dass wir Haus Chorda einen Gefallen tun und die Reste ihes Promethiums retten."
languages.original_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

Lord Captain, Santiels Stolz ist für die Chorda-Dynastie von strategischer Bedeutung. Diese Welt allein deckt den Promethium-Bedarf des gesamten Protektorats ab. Man muss kein Genie sein, um zu erraten, was geschehen ist. Das war kein leichtes Unterfangen für die verfluchten Xenos, aber beim Thron, sie haben es bewerkstelligt! Das heißt aber nicht, dass wir ihnen die wichtigen strategischen Güter einfach überlassen können. Ich schlage vor, dass wir Haus Chorda einen Gefallen tun und die Reste ihes Promethiums retten."

languages.text: «Las estrellas no se esfuman así, sin más... Es posible que aquí obren las mismas fuerzas oscuras que en el sistema Rykad... Lord Capitán, Orgullo de Santiel es un punto estratégico clave para la dinastía Chorda. Por sí solo, cubre las necesidades de prometio de todo el protectorado. No es difícil deducir lo sucedido: esos miserables xenos lo tenían todo en contra, pero ¡por el Trono que lo consiguieron! Esto no quiere decir que podamos abandonar esas importantes reservas para que las saquee cualquiera. Deberíamos hacerle un favor a la casa Chorda y recuperar lo que queda de prometio».
languages.original_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

traits.locale_text: «Las estrellas no se esfuman así, sin más... Es posible que aquí obren las mismas fuerzas oscuras que en el sistema Rykad... Lord Capitán, Orgullo de Santiel es un punto estratégico clave para la dinastía Chorda. Por sí solo, cubre las necesidades de prometio de todo el protectorado. No es difícil deducir lo sucedido: esos miserables xenos lo tenían todo en contra, pero ¡por el Trono que lo consiguieron! Esto no quiere decir que podamos abandonar esas importantes reservas para que las saquee cualquiera. Deberíamos hacerle un favor a la casa Chorda y recuperar lo que queda de prometio».

languages.text: 「星が理由もなく空から消えることなどありません。ライカド星系と同じ悪党どもが、ここでも暗躍しているのかもしれません……。ロード・キャプテン、サンティエル・プライドはチョーダ家にとって戦略的に極めて重要な惑星です。あの星ひとつで、彼らの全保護領におけるプロメチウム需要をまかなっているのです。何が起こったのかを推測するのは容易いこと。あの忌まわしい異種族にとっても容易ではなかったでしょうが…王座よ、奴らはやり遂げてしまったのです！だからといって、我々が重要な戦略資産を奴らの好き放題にさせる理由にはなりません。ここはチョーダ家に恩を売るつもりで、残されたプロメチウムを回収することを提案いたします」
languages.original_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

traits.locale_text: 「星が理由もなく空から消えることなどありません。ライカド星系と同じ悪党どもが、ここでも暗躍しているのかもしれません……。ロード・キャプテン、サンティエル・プライドはチョーダ家にとって戦略的に極めて重要な惑星です。あの星ひとつで、彼らの全保護領におけるプロメチウム需要をまかなっているのです。何が起こったのかを推測するのは容易いこと。あの忌まわしい異種族にとっても容易ではなかったでしょうが…王座よ、奴らはやり遂げてしまったのです！だからといって、我々が重要な戦略資産を奴らの好き放題にさせる理由にはなりません。ここはチョーダ家に恩を売るつもりで、残されたプロメチウムを回収することを提案いたします」

languages.text: "Gökteki yıldızlar, sebepsiz yere yok olmazlar. Rykad Sistemi'nde bazı kötü kişiler faaliyette olabilir... Santiel'in Gururu, Chorda hanedanlığı için stratejik öneme sahiptir Lord Kaptan. Tüm protektoranın prometyum ihtiyacını tek başına karşılar. Ne olduğunu çözmek çok da zor değil. Kahrolası zenoların işleri zordu ama bir şekilde başarılı oldular! Bu demek değildir ki önemli stratejik varlıkları yağmalasınlar diye geride bırakabiliriz. Chorda Hanesi'ne bir iyilik yapıp prometyumlarından geriye kalanları kurtarmamızı öneriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Stars do not vanish from the sky without a reason — the same villains may be at work here as in the Rykad System... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened — the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."
